body.name: Adesso Zig-Zag Accent Table - Table Bookshelf - Storage Side Table. Home Furnishings and Decor , Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 1 hr 22 mins
body.description: A stylish modern solution for extra storage, the Zig-Zag accent table performs double duty. The MDF wood with a black wood grain veneer assembles to provide 8” Deep storage areas for CDs, DVDs, mobile devices, remotes, etc. Use in the living room or as a bedside table. This table has a total weight capacity of about 33 lbs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Adesso Furniture Designed around efficiency, practicality and style, Adesso focuses on accent chairs, end tables, coffee tables, multi-functional tables and mirrors. With a wide variety of products, Adesso caters to an assortment of styles including contemporary, transitional and mid-century modern. Adesso utilizes an array of materials such as glass, wood and fabric in order to innovate our furniture assortment and remain a leader in the industry. Zig-Zag Accent Table with Built-In Shelves By Adesso A stylish modern solution for extra storage, the Zig-Zag accent table performs double duty. The MDF wood with a black wood grain veneer assembles to provide 8” Deep storage areas for CDs, DVDs, mobile devices, remotes, etc. Use in the living room or as a bedside table. This table has a total weight capacity of about 33 lbs. MDF wood w. black veneer 8" deep storage/display areas 21.5" Height Weight Capacity: 33 lbs
Product Features: 4 CONVENIENT STORAGE AREAS EASY ASSEMBLY CONTEMPORARY DESIGN

About Adesso Adesso, meaning “Now” in Italian was founded in 1994 by Lee Schaak, who leads the design force and Peggy Traub, a former Bloomingdale's DMM. We are headquartered In New York City, the design center of the USA. Adesso’s specialties are fresh, contemporary, affordable lighting and furniture. Adesso is a design driven company with a proven global appeal. Adesso is established as a dominant supplier of task and floor lighting in low, mid and high level markets. Adesso products can sell in Birmingham, Alabama as well as Birmingham, England.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eye-catching space saver
reviews.reviewText: This was the second of these that I've purchased. Now have a matching set. Easy assembly. Stylish. Makes a great side table for the couch with easy access to storage shelves. Considering buying a third for the basement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice solid end table
reviews.reviewText: I needed a narrow table as an end table in our spare room. I wanted something modern looking. This is perfect. It was easy to put together despite the minimal instructions. It fits together like a puzzle. All you need is an allen wrench which is supplied. The only weird thing is where they drill out the wood at an angle for the screws. It is light wood color so it shows against the black stained wood. So I just colored that in with a black sharpie. Other than that, it's a cute table at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and quality accent table with one minor flaw
reviews.reviewText: Great piece of furniture. I spent all last weekend assembling Ikea furniture, so compared to that this has very clear instructions, is very easy to put together, and appears to be made of high quality materials. The assembly screws it not just into wood, but nuts inserted into the boards, giving it the feel of a very stable piece of furniture.My only complaint is that the attachment points, because of the angles, are very clear. You can see it in the product picture at the base and unfortunately the contrast between the particle wood and the veneer is great and really detracts from the aesthetics. I think a little black paint will cover this up nicely, but it would be great if they could have included a cap or other sort of mitigation so this minor issue wouldn't be as obvious on the assembled piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: I love this table. It works great for holding books so we use it to hold library books so we always know where those end up. It’s cute too I love the design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, stable, looks good
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a thin end table to go alongside my futon in a fairly small area. This fits the bill perfectly. I can keep my drink or phone on the top, and store other items below (I keep my cat brush there as they often hop up on my lap when I'm sitting here).No cons I can think of, construction was sturdy, all pieces were included, and all the screw holes lined up easily for assembly. Hex tool included, no need for a screwdriver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little table!
reviews.reviewText: Great little side table and easy to put together. I ended up purchasing another for my other chair, so at least some of my furniture matches in the den! The side table is a perfect size for a small room and holds a great deal of things. I have coasters, a laptop with charger, box of tissues, cup of pens and pencils, a large holder with scissors and a sewing project-quite a few things for such a small side table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good look. Good price. A bit unstable but not too bad.
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a modern end table to use at a stand for some large but short speakers to lift off the ground. This was about the only one I could find which was the size I was looking for and didn't look old fashioned or too cliche. It's a smidge unstable with the way the center is designed and the narrow base but hopefully the books we intend to add for storage will resolve that. And hopefully the dogs and people don't knock into them too often or hard. Overall, it's the best we could find. We ordered two of them in two separate orders. The first one came with scratches but since they were on the underside or in areas where we didn't think anyone would notice, we decided it wasn't worth the effort to exchange them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Contemporary End Table!
reviews.reviewText: I searched and searched to find a unique end table for my living room...and almost everything I found was far too expensive for my budget. This table was a great deal, and fits in perfectly with my modern decor. It was easy to assemble - I put it together by myself in maybe 20 minutes. The quality is great - it's made from good, solid wood. It holds up a rather weighty lamp, and doesn't show any signs of sagging or wear. The shelves are perfect for storing errant magazines or books, too.

Unique design. My only complaint/issue is that the holes are not painted at all nor do they supply touch up paint. So that part looks really cheap. I'll end up finding paint to dab the holes to cover it up. I bought the black ones so it is very noticeable and your eyes are drawn to the non painted drill holes

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy and pleasant to the eye
reviews.reviewText: The table is unique. It holds small treasures Welland perfectly displays unique treasures. I wish the screws came with screw covers.
